main.name: LFG
main.bio: Experts in bringing innovations to market and scaling the companies behind them

testimonials.text: LFG worked with us from the start of our product’s lifecycle. Helping us with community building leading to successful Kickstarter and Indiegogo campaigns, and finally migrating over to our own Shopify page seamlessly. These efforts helped us build the foundation for a profitable company.
LFG helped us create an entirely new premium product category and to sell over $1M in product in our first month!
With LFG’s guidance, we were able to successfully launch Sens.ai to the masses helping to form and own sector of the consumer electronic market.
